coref: A Wolf had stolen a Lamb and was carrying a Lamb off to A Wolf lair to eat a Lamb. But A Wolf plans were very much changed when A Wolf met a Lion, who, without making any excuses, took a Lamb a Lamb away from A Wolf. A Wolf A Wolf made off to a safe distance, and then said in a much injured tone: You have no right to take my property like that! A Wolf looked back, but as A Wolf A Wolf was too far away to be taught a lesson without too much inconvenience, A Wolf said: Your property? Did you buy Your property, or did the Shepherd make you a gift of Your property?, Pray tell me, how did you get Your property?
